details.description: Doc Time is a responsive and visually engaging portfolio website built with React, Tailwind CSS, and DaisyUI. It highlights skills, showcases projects, and provides quick contact options while ensuring smooth navigation and performance.
challenges: Ensuring consistent responsive design across different devices
Optimizing image loading speed for better performance
Creating smooth animations without affecting performance
futurePlans: Add a blog section for sharing technical articles
Enhance animations and transitions for better UX

details.description: Foot Expiry System is a robust e-commerce application that helps businesses track product expiration dates, manage inventory, and ensure timely restocking. Built with the MERN stack, it features secure authentication, advanced search, and responsive design.
challenges: Managing global state for cart and user sessions
Optimizing product search and filtering functionality
futurePlans: Add product review and rating system

details.description: Sports Club Management System is an all-in-one platform for managing club memberships, event bookings, payments, and administrative tasks. It includes real-time booking synchronization, role-based access control, and fast data handling for large clubs.
challenges: Handling role-based access control for different user types
Synchronizing bookings and availability in real time
Maintaining fast performance with large datasets
